content.theme: Patience. Distance. One shot, one kill. The Precision contractor doesn't need to be close.
content.design: Precision augments reward careful aim, target analysis, and controlling engagements from range.

augments.name: Spotter Optics
augments.effect: Identify enemy Evasion and Armor values

augments.name: Recoil Dampener
augments.effect: Ignore first -1 penalty from weapon conditions per attack

augments.name: Steady Hands Mod
augments.effect: Ignore first -2 accuracy penalty from conditions

augments.name: Vital Scanner
augments.effect: +1 damage die against enemies below 50% HP

augments.name: Zeroing Algorithm
augments.effect: Attacks against same target on consecutive turns: +1 acc (stacks to +3)

augments.name: Predictive Targeting
augments.effect: +2 accuracy against targets that didn't move last turn

augments.name: Kill Confirmed
augments.effect: Crits deal double damage instead of bonus die

augments.name: Perfect Shot
augments.effect: 1/mission: declare before rolling. Attack auto-crits with maximum damage
